page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content: The busiest road is the M6 which is on the outskirts W of Plumpton.The next busiest road is the A6 which goes through Plumpton.Before the motorway was built the A6 took all the busy traffic.There aren't very many lorries on the A6 because most of them go on the motorway for the quicker route. Here follows the results of a short survey carried out in the Summer of 1985 to show the relative volumes of traffic on the M6 and A6. _____________ |M6 |M6 |A6 | per 1/4 hour _____________ |59 |69 | |23:6:85 _____________ |112|55 |17 |19:6:85 L O R R I E S _____________ | | |3 |05:6:85 _____________ |S |N | |
